text: I wouldn't like to talk about a specific work of art but i would like to talk about an artist who inspires to me at many times : Alex Dupont. I went to Paris 5 months ago and i visited an exposition of Alex Dupont in which there are several works of art of him an some informations about when he drew these, what he wants to denounce... I noticed that all of his draws catched me and chocked me, but i like them. Because, i love artists who criticize some aspects of the society by using arts. It's the case of many musical artists but Alex Dupont is one of my first artist who attracted me with his draws. It is the only artist in which i can't put one draw over the others. I also like the fact that he let the spectators make their reflexions. He is not famous because of his skills of drawing, but of what he tells in his draws, and that's why he is interesting. I also admire the fact that we don't know who is Alex Dupont, and i thought it makes him more famous that he could be if he wasn't. I also like how he can tell a message with a simply draw, and sometimes, a simply draw gives a lot of message. Alex Dupont is one of the famous artist in the world and when he drew something in a wall, we al recognize that he was him who drew that because he has his universe, he always drew of the same way. He is on a stage who all of his works of art are masterpieces.
